New Records: Haris Rauf has picked his 100th T20I wicket in just his 69th T20I innings, the third-fastest in T20I history.
Key Match Events: Johnson pummels Rauf over the cover-point fence and then sends Shaheen Afridi over his head
Shaheen Afridi struck in the last over of the powerplay
Mohammad Amir struck the first blow for Pakistan, getting Aaron Johnson caught behind
Haris Rauf gets Shreyas Movva and Ravinderpaul Singh to edge behind to the keeper
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan needs to get their fundamentals right as they need more runs from the batters
After a loss against USA in their opening game of the tournament, Pakistan need to find a way to not just win, but win big and stay alive in the competition
Canada finds themselves in a situation where a win will make the Super Eight road a bright reality
Pakistan will hope for some early wickets from Mohammad Amir
Canada captain Saad Bin Zafar says, 'I would have bowled first as well. Historically, teams batting second have found it hard to chase'
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan can smile as Pakistan get the job done
Pakistan need to chase these runs in 19.1 overs to get into positive NRR. They need to do so in 13.5 overs to move ahead of USA's
Miscellaneous Highlights: There's time for Pakistan to lose another wicket, as Fakhar Zaman's wild hack ends up in the hands of backward point
Canada manage to breach the 100-mark with Kaleem Sana carving Naseem Shah over deep backward point
The fast bowlers kept their lines tight and never managed the batters to get away
Aaron Johnson had a slice of luck on 44 when Fakhar Zaman missed a chance running back from midwicket
Nicholas Kirton has been the best batter for Canada so far this T20 World Cup
The pitch is a fresh surface, and while it seems to be playing better than the others, there is still some purchase for the bowlers. The ball is turning as well
Others: This match will be played on a fresh surface, the fourth drop-in pitch at the Nassau County
Canada have the highest score of 137 which they produced against Ireland
There have been a total of six fours and four sixes hit in this Canada innings. Out of them, four fours and four sixes were conked by Johnson
Of the first 73 runs of the Canada innings were scored by Aaron Johnson
Pakistan struggle in the powerplay. From overs four to ten, Canada have managed just two sixes and lost four wickets
